title: Greg Hands – 2016 Speech at Non-Executive Directors’ Conference

summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Greg Hands, the Chief Secretary to the Treasury, on 21 April 2016.

Over the last five years government expenditure was reduced to 40%, from the unsustainable level of 45% of GDP (Gross Domestic Product), in 2010.
